name: schedules
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_golf_data.
Tool description: PGA Tour and LIV Tour live golf data for your application needs such as rankings, leaderboards, scorecards, and results.
API description: Fetch the golf schedule for the specified organization and year.

orgid.description: Identifier for the golf organization. Choose '1' for PGA Tour or '2' for LIV Tour.

year.description: The year for which the schedule is being requested.
